scripts.deploy: cp ../shared/constants.js . && zip -r -X ../imageResizer.zip index.js constants.js && cd .. && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name image-processor --zip-file fileb://imageResizer.zip --profile carpedalan-prod
scripts.stage: cp ../shared/constants.js . && zip -r -X ../imageResizer.zip * && cd .. && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name carpedalan-west --zip-file fileb://imageResizer.zip --profile carpedev --region us-west-2
